reviewText: Keeping relationships and marriages are hard to stay on if there's something going on with themselves or feel like wanting to be back home where he/she really been missing from all the years away.

This film is an accurate reflection of the age we live in. Angel's story resonates across socioeconomic and ethnic boundaries leaving each of us with a ghost from the past. The journeys taken by the characters are informed by daily life. For a behind the scenes look at the traumas of the health crisis, this is the place to go.
What a gripping story! I didn't expect to fall in love with the characters along the way. I'm looking forward to the Producer's next film!
